definition: a service conducted in a house of worship, to perform a special church rite or service for
details:
noun
- a service conducted in a house of worship
= example: a service conducted in a house of worship
= synonyms: church service
- a place for public (especially Christian) worship
= example: a place for public (especially Christian) worship
= synonyms: church building
- one of the groups of Christians who have their own beliefs and forms of worship
- the body of people who attend or belong to a particular local church
= example: the body of people who attend or belong to a particular local church
verb
- to perform a special church rite or service for
= example: to perform a special church rite or service for
